title: Authors and Citation
text: Chandrashekar B (2025). Rpackage: DALY Dashboard: Infection Burden Analysis (ETC5523). R package version 0.1.0, https://etc5523-2025.github.io/assignment-4-packages--shiny-apps-bhuv-c/.
code: @Manual{,   title = {Rpackage: DALY Dashboard: Infection Burden Analysis (ETC5523)},   author = {Bhuvana Chandrashekar},   year = {2025},   note = {R package version 0.1.0},   url = {https://etc5523-2025.github.io/assignment-4-packages-and-shiny-apps-bhuv-c/}, }

title: Rpackage
text: Rpackage interactive Shiny dashboard packaged ETC5523 – Communicating Data (Monash University). visualises Disability-Adjusted Life Years (DALYs) per 100,000 five healthcare-associated infections, split YLD (Years Lived Disability) YLL (Years Life Lost), across two surveillance studies: German PPS ECDC PPS (EU/EEA).

title: Rpackage
text: clean, tidy dataset infection-burden metrics (Data). fully interactive Shiny app (inst/app) crimson theme. pkgdown site consistent styling documentation. Examples clear data descriptions align ETC5523 rubric.

title: Rpackage
text: dataset (Data) provides DALY estimates per 100,000 population five infection categories, across two study groups two DALY components. bar dashboard shows YLD + YLL contributions total burden infection type, allowing comparisons across studies components. | Standard error stacked total (YLD + YLL), used draw uncertainty/error bars. | Notes interpretation stacked bars, error bar represents uncertainty total DALY burden (YLD + YLL). side--side bars, component values (YLD vs YLL) shown separately total-SE bar hidden. Source: Zacher, B. et al. (2019). Disease burden healthcare-associated infections Germany. Read paper → https://cwd.numbat.space/assignments/assignment-2-papers/Zacher2019.pdf

title: Rpackage — Data
text: dataset contains Disability-Adjusted Life Years (DALYs) per 100,000 population five major healthcare-associated infections — HAP, SSI, BSI, UTI, CDI — across two surveillance studies: German PPS ECDC PPS (EU/EEA).

title: Rpackage — Data
text: tibble 20 rows 5 variables: group Surveillance study — either "German PPS" "ECDC PPS". category Infection type: HAP (Hospital-acquired pneumonia), SSI (Surgical site infection), BSI (Bloodstream infection), UTI (Urinary tract infection), CDI (Clostridioides difficile infection). component DALY component — "YLD" (Years Lived Disability) "YLL" (Years Life Lost). value DALYs per 100,000 population infection component. se Standard error total DALY estimate (used uncertainty/error bars).

title: Rpackage — Data
text: Adapted Zacher, B. et al. (2019), Estimates burden healthcare-associated infections Germany based population survey, PLOS Medicine. https://cwd.numbat.space/assignments/assignment-2-papers/Zacher2019.pdf

title: Rpackage — Data
text: infection’s burden represented two DALY components: YLD (Years Lived Disability) – measures morbidity time lived less full health. YLL (Years Life Lost) – measures premature mortality due infection. dataset supports analysis visualisation infection burden across surveillance regions, including uncertainty standard error values.

title: Rpackage — Data
code: data("Data", package = "Rpackage") head(Data) #> # A tibble: 6 × 5 #>   group      category component value    se #>   <chr>      <fct>    <fct>     <dbl> <dbl> #> 1 German PPS HAP      YLD          35    30 #> 2 German PPS HAP      YLL          50    30 #> 3 German PPS SSI      YLD           8     6 #> 4 German PPS SSI      YLL          30     6 #> 5 German PPS BSI      YLD          12    28 #> 6 German PPS BSI      YLL          59    28

what: Launch the packaged Shiny app — run_app
title: Launch the packaged Shiny app — run_app
text: Opens example DALY dashboard bundled inst/app. Packages needed: shiny (app’s suggested packages).
